title: Issue a Boarding Pass
description: A traveler who has already checked in online needs their boarding pass sent to their email.

tasks.description: Retrieve the traveler's booking using their confirmation code.
Verify that the passenger is checked in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the passenger's check-in status is complete.

tasks.description: Send the boarding pass to the email address on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully emails the boarding pass.
